name: Flappy Bird (Recreated)
description:
It's Flappy Bird! 

  • Press ENTER to start the game!
  • Press SPACE to flap!

I used this game to teach the basics of Unity Engine to students during a seminar i conducted in my university.  

The full project for this game is available for download via my GitHub! (https://github.com/gabanciano/FlappyBirdUnity) 

I hope it helps! Happy coding!
